title: Alacritty sessions aren't registered as TTYS on OSX Catalina
body:
When executing the `who` command I normally see the console session (osx debug) and all iterm/terminal sessions on my Macbook. This is however not the case with Alacritty, none of my alacritty sessions (nor tmux sessions that I create within an Alacritty session) are shown in `who`. Is there a reason for alacritty somehow flying under the system's radar?

Who command executed in iterm 
![Screenshot 2020-03-04 at 10 14 43](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3583395/75863667-2495d980-5e01-11ea-8c04-187c73bf357a.png)

Who command in alacritty with Iterm no longer running:
![Screenshot 2020-03-04 at 10 16 32](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3583395/75863799-57d86880-5e01-11ea-9f1d-142d3db45cc1.png)

### System

OS: macOS
Version: alacritty 0.4.1 (4d9253b)
